tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE solo_travelers (
  traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  traveler_name VARCHAR(50),
  travel_destination VARCHAR(50),
  travel_date DATE,
  booking_details TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE solo_travelers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone VARCHAR(15));
CREATE TABLE travel_itineraries (id INT PRIMARY KEY, traveler_id INT, destination VARCHAR(50), start_date DATE, end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE itinerary (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination VARCHAR(255),
  arrival_date DATE,
  departure_date DATE,
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  itinerary_id INT REFERENCES itinerary(id),
  booking_date DATE,
  booking_type VARCHAR(50),
  booking_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE solo_travelers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  traveler_name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE itinerary (
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    itinerary_id INT,
    booking_date DATE,
    booking_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (itinerary_id) REFERENCES itinerary(itinerary_id)
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    booking_id INT,
    flight_number VARCHAR(20),
    departure_date DATE,
    arrival_date DATE,
    seat_number VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (booking_id) REFERENCES bookings(booking_id)
);

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
    accommodation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    booking_id INT,
    accommodation_type VARCHAR(50),
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    room_number VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (booking_id) REFERENCES bookings(booking_id)
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    itinerary_id INT,
    activity_name VARCHAR(100),
    activity_date DATE,
    notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (itinerary_id) REFERENCES itinerary(itinerary_id)
);
